body.quiz:
Read the following passage, and answer the question below:
Omnes de Aenea fabulas legerunt (1). Sed multi de me, Lavinia, coniunx Italica Aeneae, non legerunt (2). Paris et Troiani bellum cum Menalao et Graecis de Helena gesserant. Tamen, Turnus et alii Italici bellum cum Aenea et Troianis et aliis Italis de me gerebant (3). Dum Troiani in Italia bellum gerebant, multi viri pugnabant; sed, paucae feminae non timebant sed eae iuvabant (4).

Based upon sentence 3, who were Turnus and Aeneas fighting a war over?

Name the case, number, and gender of the superlative adjective in bold type in the sentence.
Mars ab Iunone audacissima in bello Troiano castigatus erat.

Read the following passage and answer the question below:
In fabula Martis et Veneris, deus, Sol, deis immortalibus de amore tacitiore eorum dixit (1). Venus erat iratissima ad Solem, qui in aures Vulcani, artificis ignomiam eius propulsaverat (2). Itaque, dea acrior, Venus, Soli nympham Leucothoen dedit (3). Ob hoc, Sol Leucothoen cupiditate ferocius amare incepit (4). Ob hunc amorem dementiorem, frater Leucothoes filiam suam crudellime castigavit (5).

Based on sentence 5, what did Leucothoe’s father to do her?
options: He punished her brother very cruelly.

body.answer: Through the most bitter wind, the heavy infantry marched rather easily into battle.

Through the rather bitter wind, the heavy infantry marched rather easily into battle.
Through the most bitter wind, the heavy infantry marched very easily into battle.

Step 3: ________ (while creating) cognomen pro me, modum nostrum vivendi mutare consilium cape.
Step 4: Pacem et spem in populos _______ (receiving) in provinciis cognitationem prema.

In step 4, what is the correct Latin form of the English word in bold type?

spiranti

Use this passage to answer the question that follows.
Regnum Neronis crudelia effecerunt (1). Primum, Nerone Imperatore facturo, Agrippina maritum, Claudium, necavit (2). Tum, Roma incendienti, Nero, observans ignem, lyram ludit (3). Nero, qui Domum Auream aedificaturus erat, demens et pessimus factus erat (4).

Based on sentence 4, what action was Nero taking in regard to his Domus Aurea?

body.answer: With Actaeon approaching her, Diana seemed to be about to bring about death onto him.

How to be a member of the Circle of Maecenas (M-Circle):
Step 1: Sci te magnum poetam esse.
Step 2: Dic Maecenam optimum patronum esse.
Step 3: Monstra scriptiones tuas Augusto delectatas esse.

body.answer: Know that your works will be remembered by all Romans.

Know that all Romans remember your works.

People will say that the Roman poets will create the best art.
